original_title: President convenes party leaders’ meeting to discuss IMF proposals
original_body_lines: Colombo, March 8 (Daily Mirror)- President Ranil Wickremesinghe has convened a party leaders meeting on Monday to discuss the International Monetary Fund's proposals with its high level delegation, the President's Media Division (PMD) said.
The meeting has offered a chance to accepted opposition party leaders in Parliament to discuss the International Monetary Fund's proposals with its high level delegation, the PMD added.
